items.title: Businesses call to be included in any pub rates backtrack
items.description: Shops, pharmacies and music venues want any climbdown on business rates for pubs to apply to them too.

items.title: Elon Musk’s X limits Grok AI image editing after outcry over sexualised deepfakes
items.description: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

items.title: Venezuelan government begins releasing political prisoners
items.description: The US, which recently captured its President Nicolás Maduro, has long demanded the detainees be freed.

items.title: Winning in England will be Australia's next goal - McGrath column
items.description: After a comfortable 4-1 series win in the Ashes, Australia's next goal will be winning in England for the first time in 26 years when they tour next s...

items.title: 'My best is yet to come' - Semenyo joins Man City in £65m deal
items.description: Manchester City sign Ghana winger Antoine Semenyo from Bournemouth on a contract until 2031.
